__e: So, I just tell him I'm a comedian and then he goes:
And I have to tell you, on some level, as a female comedian, I kind of get that.

(David Johndrow) I remember Kevin telling me early on that he's gonna be a comedian and he writes comedy, and I thought that was really strange, because we were only 16 years old or something and finally I just said, "Kevin, I want to go over and meet this Bill guy."
The problem is, no matter how great the show was.. you girls are looking for the comedian again.
That's the comedian that you're most like?
